title: Paul McCartney
description: Don’t miss the chance to see Paul McCartney in Argentina! This special package includes one night of accommodation with breakfast on October 5th, tickets to the concert at Estadio Más Monumental River Plate, transportation, and travel assistance. Enjoy a comfortable and worry-free stay as you prepare for an unforgettable night with one of the greatest music icons. Book now and get ready for a unique experience with Paul McCartney in Buenos Aires!

title: Eric Clapton
description: Get ready for the legendary Eric Clapton concert on September 20th at Estadio Vélez in Buenos Aires with our exclusive package! Enjoy one night of accommodation with breakfast at a comfortable 3-star hotel in the city center, ensuring a cozy and convenient stay. Additionally, we offer round-trip transfers to the event on a regular service with permanent coordination, so you can enjoy the concert without transportation worries. With your Platea Alta ticket, you'll have an excellent view of the stage and will be able to enjoy Eric Clapton's music in all its greatness. Don't miss the opportunity to witness a living legend of rock live and create unforgettable memories at Estadio Vélez. Book now and get ready for a magical night full of music and emotion!

title: Rock in Rio
description: Get ready to experience the excitement of the Rock in Rio festival at Parque Olímpico Barra in Rio de Janeiro with our exclusive package! Enjoy 3 nights of accommodation with breakfast at a comfortable hotel to recharge before and after the festival. Additionally, we provide you with tickets to the event so you can enjoy your favorite artists live. For your convenience, we include private round-trip transfers from the airport to the hotel and from the hotel to Parque Olímpico Barra. We also offer private transfers to the event, ensuring you arrive and return comfortably and safely. Don't miss the opportunity to live an unforgettable experience at one of the world's largest music festivals. Book now and get ready to rock at Rock in Rio!

title: Tomorrowland Brazil
description: Immerse yourself in the unforgettable experience of Tomorrowland Brazil 2024 with our exclusive package! Enjoy 4 nights of accommodation in one of our selected 4-star hotels, including Radisson Alphaville, Confort Alphaville, and Quality Suites Alphaville from October 10th to 14th. With your 3-day Full Madness pass and the incredible Treasure Case, you'll have full access to all the exciting activities and performances of the festival. Additionally, we offer transfers to the event in regular service so you can arrive and return comfortably. With our full-time team at the event, you'll be well taken care of throughout your stay at Tomorrowland. If you prefer a more private option, we also offer private in/out transfers for an additional cost of USD 110. And to make your experience even more convenient, we can quote your flight! Don't miss the opportunity to experience the magic of Tomorrowland in Brazil. Book now and get ready for a unique and unforgettable experience!

title: Rock in Rio
description: Get ready to experience the unforgettable Rock in Rio in September 2024 with our exciting package! Enjoy 4 days and 3 nights of accommodation in a 4-star hotel with breakfast included, so you can recharge before and after the festival. Additionally, you'll have a general admission ticket to the event for one day, where you can enjoy incredible performances from your favorite artists. For your convenience, we also include arrival and departure transfers, ensuring you arrive at the festival and return to the hotel worry-free. Plus, you'll receive a Rock in Rio kit including a bag, sunglasses, and a rain poncho so you're prepared for any situation. Don't miss the chance to experience the excitement of Rock in Rio at the Olympic Park Barra in Rio de Janeiro. Book now and get ready for unforgettable moments filled with music and fun!
